name: Roar of the Earthbound Immortal
notes: Card Name updated from "Roar of the Earthbound" on September 27, 2019.
effectText: Once per turn, if an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the destroyed monster's ATK. You must control an "Earthbound Immortal" monster with ATK higher than the ATK of the attacking monster to activate and to resolve this effect.
